description: This file sets up an audio and text chat agent using various components such as Agent, OpenAIChat, Playground, and SqliteStorage, and configures a playground app for audio conversation.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent with specific configurations for interaction.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for OpenAI chat models with specific modalities and audio settings.

classes.name: Playground
classes.description: Provides a playground environment for agents with methods to get the app and serve it.

classes.name: SqliteStorage
classes.description: Handles storage using SQLite database for agent data.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Retrieves the web application instance for the playground.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Runs the playground app, optionally with reload enabled.
